metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3238 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A double-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s NTFS3 subsystem in how auser triggers remount and umount simultaneously. This flaw allows a localuser to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-ibm package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
